<img src="http://blog.bearshare.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/Birthday-Dog.jpg" />

Hi Folks,

It is my birthday today (34), it was only 13 days since my last offer but I cleared this with Maarten in advance and will take a 2 day penalty for my next offer.

I have posted my normal offers below this birthday special but to celebrate here are some one time only limited quantity deals.

The Birthday offers will be 1 day only but you keep the price for the life of the product, they must be bought within 24 hours though.

**Miami Florida - OpenVZ - BIRTHDAY SPECIAL**
 
<pre>
4 vCPU
4 GB Ram
1 GB vSWAP
80 GB Raid 10 Disk
3 TB Bandwidth @ gbit (load balanced with fail over)
</pre>

**65% off Promo Code:** PARTY4096 (will work for monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, yearly.

**Order Link:**https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=112

**Price:** €4.20 p/month

**LIMITED TO 5 ORDERS**


<pre>
4 vCPU
6 GB Ram
1 GB vSWAP
100 GB Raid 10 Disk
4TB Bandwidth @ gbit (load balanced with fail over)
</pre>

**65% off Promo Code:** PARTY6144 (will work for monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, yearly.

**Order Link:**https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=113

**Price:** €5.20 p/month

**LIMITED TO 5 ORDERS**



As an added bonus for the next 24 hours the low end spirit bundle deal will be reduced to €10.00 p/year - UK/NL/JP/IT/USA - all 5 for €10.00 in total per year!.

https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&bid=1

Further info on Low End Spirit at the bottom of this post.


The above offers are celebratory limited quantity limited time offers, they will not be offered again (until perhaps next year), current packages people may have cannot be transferred to these offers.

And now on with the regular offers!.

<img src="http://inceptionhosting.com/logob.png" />
 
Inception Hosting launched a new product line based on OpenVZ+Virtualizor in the last week or so and the feedback has been great so more of the same below and then the Xen offers below those and finally the low end spirit offers below those :)

**//////// Info \\\\**
 
**Network and Locations**
 
<pre>
Test IP's on request by PM.
 
General Notes
 
No TOR/Public Proxy No IRC Servers in USA (DC enforced port filtering in place for common IRC ports) absolutely no crypto currency mining.
 
No Bulk Mailing
 
Servers are self managed by your expert fingers
 
Payment via PayPal, BitPay or Moneybookers/Skrill
 
Nodes are a mix on E3-1270(NL), X3470(Phoenix), E5-2620(Miami), E5630/45(UK) All Nodes are Raid 10 with either 4, 6 or 8 disks.
 
2 Day refund policy in place, please read the terms, if you choose to set up a subscription payment it is your responsibility to maintain, any over payments are held as account credit.
 
CPU Cores are on an ----> equal share basis
 
</pre>
 
**LOW END SPIRIT**
 
**BUNDLE DEAL**
 
JAPAN - ITALY - UK - DALLAS - NETHERLANDS
 
5 VPS FOR JUST €13.00 P/YEAR (TOTAL)
https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&bid=1

<img src="http://i.imgur.com/Tvj8d0J.png" />
 
(Los Angeles - coming soon)
 
Only €3.00 **p/year**
 
**Order Link:** http://lowendspirit.com/locations.html
 
Further information available via the FAQ on the LES site or pop over to the forum for pre sales questions http://forum.lowendspirit.com
 
**Important** In the interest of transparency the **Japan** location is nested inside a larger KVM instance, however due to the more modern hardware and pure SSD is it the fastest performing of all locations.
 
Please take some time to understand what LowEndSpirit is before buying, this product is none refundable.
 
The Australia location is ran by RansomIT and is not part of this offer.
 
Thanks as always for reading, if anyone wants a custom quote let me know, VPS packages available up to 16GB Ram,
